text: Cﾄフﾄネin Marian Predoiu (; born 27 August 1968) is a Romanian politician and lawyer who has been serving as the acting Prime Minister of Romania since 6 May 2025. He was acting prime minister before from 12 June to 15 June 2023 and from 6 February to 9 February 2012. He was the Minister of Justice three times from 2008 to 2012, 2019 to 2020, and from 2021 to 2023.Hotnews.ro Dumitrina Galantonu 29 Feb. 2008 Catalin Marian Predoiu, noul ministru al Justitiei (in Romanian) ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Romania Category:Romanian lawyers
title: Cﾄフﾄネin Predoiu
